languages.text: {n}Династия может гордиться, что в ее владение попал столь великий и мудрый механизм.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Династия может гордиться, что в ее владение попал столь великий и мудрый механизм.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The dynasty should be proud to have such a great and wise mechanism installed in its domain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hanedanlık, böylesine büyük ve bilge bir mekanizmayı bünyesinde barındırdığı için gurur duymalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dynasty should be proud to have such a great and wise mechanism installed in its domain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hanedanlık, böylesine büyük ve bilge bir mekanizmayı bünyesinde barındırdığı için gurur duymalı.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La dynastie peut être fière qu'un mécanisme aussi majestueux et aussi sage ait été installé dans son domaine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dynasty should be proud to have such a great and wise mechanism installed in its domain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La dynastie peut être fière qu'un mécanisme aussi majestueux et aussi sage ait été installé dans son domaine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}このような偉大で賢明な機械がその領域に設置されていることを、王朝は誇りに思うべきだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dynasty should be proud to have such a great and wise mechanism installed in its domain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}このような偉大で賢明な機械がその領域に設置されていることを、王朝は誇りに思うべきだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}王朝居然拥有如此精巧、如此伟大的机器，这确实是件值得自豪的事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dynasty should be proud to have such a great and wise mechanism installed in its domain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}王朝居然拥有如此精巧、如此伟大的机器，这确实是件值得自豪的事情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La dinastía puede estar orgullosa de tener un mecanismo tan grande y sabio en sus dominios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dynasty should be proud to have such a great and wise mechanism installed in its domain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La dinastía puede estar orgullosa de tener un mecanismo tan grande y sabio en sus dominios.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Dynastie sollte stolz sein, dass es in ihrem Einflussbereich einen derart grandiosen und weisen Mechanismus gibt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The dynasty should be proud to have such a great and wise mechanism installed in its domain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Dynastie sollte stolz sein, dass es in ihrem Einflussbereich einen derart grandiosen und weisen Mechanismus gibt.{/n}
